attributes.action: immediatly announce an independant public enquiry headed by an independant body to review the levels of equipment needed by our armed forces, and to action any recommendations made by such an enquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We hear daily of our servicemen and women putting their lives on the line in Afghanistan, and of wives and loved ones having to buy kit to keep our soldiers safe and provide them with their basic needs. 

We need the government to stop sitting around debating the issues of equipment supply to the armed forces and immediatly review the levels of support and equipment via an INDEPENDANT PUBLIC ENQUIRY made up of former military personnel and members of the public with relevant expertise, and promise to carry out any actions recommended by the enquiry.

Only then can we stop the needless deaths occuring daily to our service personnel, and provide a peace of mind for loved ones back at home.
